chunks.chunk_text: Taiwan is on the list of potential countries allowed to send travelers to Vietnamas the nation's Canhó province recently released plans to reopen borders for international travelersAccording to VN ExpressCanhó's local government submitted a draft of a two-stage vaccine passport programto the Vietnamese Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 旅行相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 travel.json

chunks.chunk_text: to welcome foreign travelers into the regionThe first stage is scheduled to begin near the end of Novemberand travelers need to take charter flights to the countryand stay at the resort at Come Run, the proposal statedThe second stage is planned to start from Januaryto March 2022 during which visitors will be able to visit more attractions and resorts
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 旅行相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 travel.json

chunks.chunk_text: Canhó province currently welcomes travelers from countrieswhose COVID-19 situation has been successfully controlledand have a high vaccination rate for its populationAs of Tuesday, countries that fit bothcategories according to the local government includeChina, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan, Russia, Australia, France, Germany,
